Package com.jme3.environment.baker

Interface IBLEnvBaker

All Superinterfaces:
EnvBaker
All Known Implementing Classes:
IBLGLEnvBaker
public interface IBLEnvBaker extends EnvBaker
An environment baker, but this one is for Imaged Base Lighting.
